body:
Our org has a dynamic discovery service that allows us to determine the hostname/IP of our Cassandra seed nodes based on a logical cluster name. This is nice because it means we don't have to update our config as different Cassandra hosts are rotated in and out of the cluster over time.

It should be possible to supply a custom seed provider via a well defined interface.

Ideally this would be surfaced as a new ServerOption that could be applied with, e.g.:

```
        s := temporal.NewServer(
		temporal.ForServices(temporal.Services),
		temporal.WithConfig(cfg),
                ...
                temporal.WithCassandraSeedProvider(mycassandra.NewMySeedProvider(cfg)),
	)
```
title: Provide a hook to specify a custom Cassandra seed node provider
